instruction: Fill all the blank cells with the value in the cell above it

minimal: `HOTKEY` 'CTRL+G' to open the 'Go To Special' dialog box
`CLICK` the first table cell in the specific column
`TYPE` =C2 (assuming C2 is the first cell with a value above a blank)
batched: `HOTKEY` 'CTRL+G' to open the 'Go To Special' dialog box
`CLICK` the first table cell in the specific column
`TYPE` =C2 (assuming C2 is the first cell with a value above a blank)
